name: ghost_town_turnin.png
title: Becoming Ghost Towns
description: This data visualization exposes counties who have lost over 10% of their population from 2020 to end of 2023, who have also had 4 years of consecutive population losses. Beyond what is conveyed, I am left curious about the stories of these places, and what types of patterns could potentially be seen if I pulled data preceding places that have become ghost towns for comparison.
alt: Data Visualization depicting alluvial diagrams of 4 counties sho have lost over ten percent of their population between 2020 and the end of 2024.

name: Explore_sex_dominated_industries_over_time_v2.png
title: Gender Makeup of Industries Over Time (2003-2023)
description: This data visualization displays the gender makeup of industries over time from 2003 to 2023. The color gradations show distinct differences across industries but relatively little change in the gender makeup of industries over time.
alt: Data Visualization depicting the gender makeup of various industries over time from 2003 to 2023.

name: GenderDistributionByOcc.png
title: Gender Distribution by Occupation
description: This data visualization shows the gender distribution across various occupations. The data highlights the disparities in gender representation in different job sectors.
alt: Data Visualization depicting the gender distribution across various occupations.

name: pandemic_baby.png
title: Pandemic Baby Bump
description: This data visualization depicts birth data from 2020 to 2023, showing a jump in births in 2021.
alt: Data Visualization depicting the number of births in the United States from 2020 to 2023.

name: pandemic_baby_v1.png
title: Pandemic Baby Bump Version 1
description: This data visualization depicts birth data from 2020 to 2023, showing a jump in births in 2021 based on the US census.
alt: Data Visualization depicting the number of births in the United States from 2020 to 2023.

name: Volunteering.png
title: Who Volunteers Based on Activity of Daily Living Data
description: This visual is a static version of what ideally would be one of those show as you scroll visuals you sometimes see in the New York Times, animating it will have to be one of my next ventures. The data is from the American Time Use Survey and shows the percentage of people who volunteer based on their activity of daily living.
alt: Multiple visuals depicting the percentage of people who volunteer based on their activity of daily living with information on their relative rate of volunteering relative to their base representation in the data.

name: MovieTheaterDecline.png
title: Less Time at the Movies
description: This data visualization shows the decline in time spent at the movies from 2003 to 2023 in context with data from the performing arts. The core data is from the American Time Use Survey.
alt: Data Visualization depicting the decline in time spent at the movies from 2003 to 2023.

name: DomRateMig2023.png
title: Domestic Migration Rates 2023: Which Counties Feel the Most Change?
description: This data visualization is based on domestic migration rates for 2023 from the US census. The visual hones in on the top and bottom fourth percentiles of counties in terms of migration rates as larger rates of migration both incoming or outgoing is a likely indicator of where county residents notice the most change.
alt: Data Visualization of the counties within the top and bottom fourth percentiles of domestic migration rates in 2023 according to the US census data.

name: DailyLiving.png
title: Differences in Daily Living Between Unmarried vs Married People Ages 40+
description: This data visualization shows the differences in daily living between unmarried and married people ages 40 and older. The data is from the American Time Use Survey and augmented by other sources cited on the visual.
alt: Data Visualization depicting the differences in daily living between unmarried and married people ages 40 and older.

name: Roevwade_redo.png
title: (Iteration 3) Exploring Birth Data Post Roe v Wade In Regions With Differing Laws
description: This visualization seeks to explore if there are any notable changes in birth data post Roe v Wade in regions with differing laws. The birth data is from the US census. This is one of 3 iterations of this visualization.
alt: A visual depicting birth data and birth rate data by regions with differing laws post Roe v Wade.

name: roeVwadeIter1.png
title: (Iteration 1) Exploring Birth Data Post Roe v Wade In Regions With Differing Laws
description: This visualization seeks to explore if there are any notable changes in birth data post Roe v Wade in regions with differing laws. The birth data is from the US census. This is one of 3 iterations of this visualization.
alt: A visual depicting birth data by regions with differing laws post Roe v Wade.

name: roeVwadeIter2.png
title: (Iteration 2) Exploring Birth Data Post Roe v Wade In Regions With Differing Laws
description: This visualization seeks to explore if there are any notable changes in birth data post Roe v Wade in regions with differing laws. The birth data is from the US census. This is one of 3 iterations of this visualization.
alt: A visual depicting birth data by regions with differing laws post Roe v Wade.

name: SeekingSimilarity.png
title: Seeking Similarity in the American Time Use Survey
description: This data visualization is a personal exploration of the ATUS data to see if I could use it to find others like me. It is a static version of what ideally would be interactive such that individuals could do their own self exploration.
alt: Data Visualization that explores how many people could be found by the author who have a similar time use profile as the author based on the American Time Use Survey.

name: whichStitch-100.jpg
title: Which Stitch?
description: This is an informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It is a guide to help students identify different types of stitches and know some scenarios for which they are appropriate.
alt: An informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It is a guide to help students identify different types of stitches and know some scenarios for which they are appropriate.

name: KnowYourNeedleHorizontal-100.jpg
title: Know Your Needle
description: This is an informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It is a guide to help students identify when to use different needle weights for their sewing projects.
alt: An informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It is a guide to help students identify when to use different needle weights for their sewing projects.

name: knowNeedleV1-100.jpg
title: Know Your Needle (Vertical Version)
description: This is an informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It is a guide to help students identify when to use different needle weights for their sewing projects.
alt: An informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It is a guide to help students identify when to use different needle weights for their sewing projects.

name: Troubleshooting-100.jpg
title: Troubleshooting Tips For Your Sewing Project
description: This is an informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It is a guide to help students troubleshoot common issues that may arise during their sewing projects.
alt: An informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It is a guide to help students troubleshoot common issues that may arise during their sewing projects.

name: IndustrialSewing-100.jpg
title: Industrial Sewing Machine Informational Graphic
description: This is an informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It shares some basic information about the industrial sewing machine in the studio.
alt: An informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It shares some basic information about the industrial sewing machine in the studio.

name: SingerSewing-100.jpg
title: Singer Sewing Machine Informational Graphic
description: This is an informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It shares some basic information about the industrial sewing machine in the studio.
alt: An informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It shares some basic information about the industrial sewing machine in the studio.

name: Serger-100.jpg
title: Serger Informational Graphic
description: This is an informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It shares some basic information about the Serger machine in the studio.
alt: An informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It shares some basic information about the Serger machine in the studio.

name: CNCEmbroidery-100.jpg
title: CNC Embroidery Machine Informational Graphic
description: This is an informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It shares some basic information about the CNC Embroidery machine in the studio.
alt: An informational graphic for the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It shares some basic information about the CNC Embroidery machine in the studio.

name: QR_HowTo_Idea-100.jpg
title: Idea for displaying How-To links
description: This is an idea for displaying how-to links in the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. We opted to instead include a single QR code in vinyl on the machines themselves that bring you to the Singer app.
alt: An idea for displaying how-to links in the textiles studio in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison.

name: machineShop-100.jpg
title: Mockup Machine Shop Informational Graphic
description: This is a mockup of an informational graphic for the machine shop in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It shares some basic information about the machine shop.
alt: A mockup of an informational graphic for the machine shop in the Design Innovation Lab in Wendt at UW-Madison. It shares some basic information about the machine shop.

name: Migration_tableau.png
title: Migration Patterns in the United States (Tableau)
description: This data visualization a Tableau Dashboard specifically with Nevada selected to view the Domestic and International Migration rates within the area. The data is from the US census.
alt: Data Visualization depicting migration statistics in the United States with a focus on Nevada.

name: StockMarketCrash.png
title: Unemployment Rates - Stock Market Crash 2008
description: This data visualization shows the unemployment rates over time with a call out to the stock market crash of 2008. The data is from the US census.
alt: Data Visualization depicting the unemployment rates over time pointing out the stock market crash of 2008.

name: popEstimateTreeMap.png
title: Population Estimates Tree Map 2023
description: This data visualization is a tree map generated in Tableau that shows the population estimates for 2023. The data is from the US census.
alt: Data Visualization depicting the population estimates for 2023.

name: DataExplorationHeatMap_weekendVsWeekday.png
title: Data Exploration: Exploring Patterns in Time Spent On the Weekend vs the Week for Employed vs Non-Employed People
description: This data visualization was exploratory and not intended to be a final visual. It explores patterns in time spent on the weekend vs the week for employed vs non-employed people. The data is from the American Time Use Survey.
alt: Data Visualization depicting patterns in time spent on the weekend vs the week for employed vs non-employed people.

name: DataExploration_ageDifferenceTimeSpent.png
title: Data Exploration: Exploring Differences Between Average Time Spent on Specific Activities in Differing Age Groups
description: This data visualization was exploratory and not intended to be a final visual. It explores differences between average time spent on specific activities in differing age groups. The data is from the American Time Use Survey.
alt: Data Visualization depicting differences between average time spent on specific activities in differing age groups.

name: dataExplore_dailyactivitiesbyage.png
title: Data Exploration: Exploring Daily Activities by Age
description: This data visualization was exploratory and depicts normalized average time spent on various activities colored by age. The data is from the American Time Use Survey.
alt: Data Visualization depicting normalized average time spent on various activities colored by age.

name: sleeping_weekendvweekday.png
title: Data Exploration: Sleeping: Weekend vs Weekday
description: This data visualization was exploratory and not intended to be a final visual. It explores the differences in time spent sleeping on the weekend vs the weekday. The data is from the American Time Use Survey.
alt: Data Visualization depicting the differences in time spent sleeping on the weekend vs the weekday.

name: dailyActivitiesCorrelationWeekendvsWeekday.png
title: Data Exploration: Correlation of Daily Activities on the Weekend vs the Weekday
description: This data visualization was exploratory and not intended to be a final visual. It explores the correlation of daily activities on the weekend vs the weekday. The data is from the American Time Use Survey.
alt: Data Visualization depicting the correlation of daily activities on the weekend vs the weekday.

name: datacheck_23plushourssleeping.png
title: Data Exploration: 23+ Hours Sleeping
description: This data visualization was exploratory and not intended to be a final visual. It explores the number of people who report sleeping 23+ hours in a day. The data is from the American Time Use Survey.
alt: Data Visualization depicting the number of people who report sleeping 23+ hours in a day.
